title: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light (Multi5) RePack By R.G Cata
description:
NFORMATION:
 Released: 2010 
 Genre: Arcade (Platform) / 3D / Isometric
 Developer: Crystal Dynamics
 Publisher: Square Enix
 Game Version: 1.0.3
 Publication Type: Repak
 Language: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian
 Language: [English, German, French, Spanish, Italian]
 Tablet: enclosing (THETA)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
 Operating system: Windows XP (SP3) / Vista / 7
 Processor: Pentium IV - 1.5 GHz / Athlon 64 - 1.5 GHz
 Memory: 1 GB (for XP / Vista / 7)
 Video: 128 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9.0
 Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
 Free hard drive space: 8.39 GB

FEATURES:
     Unlike previous games in the series Tomb Raider, in the arcade Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light Lara can play with a partner, and the camera is placed over his head. 
Over 2000 years ago the forces of good and evil fought for artifact Mirror Smoke, has enormous power that allows alternate day and night, or forever to load the entire world into darkness. Meanwhile, the fearless leader of the Army of Light Totek, took possession of great power artifact and imprisoned evil spirit Ksanksolta. Totek buried himself in the mirror at the Temple of Light to protect the artifact from the forces of evil. But after 2000 years of Lara Croft has gone to the mountains of Central America in search of long-lost Temple. Mercenaries stealing an artifact, Ksanksoltu allowed to return to this world, for that have paid with their lives. Totek, accusing Lara happened, decides to cooperate with it to restore the mirror. If the artifact does not return to the forces of Light Ksanksolt uses power mirrors and plunge the world into eternal darkness ...

GAME FEATURES:
 Cooperative game and co-flow plot for two players
 The plot outside the main storyline Series Tomb Raider
 A new adventure with Lara Croft in the style of retro games
 The second character - a warrior Maya Totek
     
Features repack:
Do not cut / no recoded
Integrate all 5 DLC: Challenge Pack # 1, Challenge Pack # 2, Challenge Pack # 3, Kane & Lynch Pack, Raziel & Kain Pack
Installation time ~ 15 minutes
